title: Climate legislation in California is clearing hurdle with deal on energy plans
text:
04 Climate legislation in California is clearing hurdle with deal on energy plans 
Los Angeles Times: Senate leader Kevin de Le√≥n, electrical utilities and the governor's office are nearing an agreement on how proposed climate change legislation would increase the use of renewable energy in California, according to Capitol sources.
